REBATE MANAGEMENT
Add Benefits and Benefit Mappings for a Rebate Type

Create benefits for a rebate type to define the thresholds of an incentive and how payouts are scaled for varying quantities and amounts. Add benefit tiers with a range of sales targets and applicable benefit values. Introduce granularity to the incentive structure by adding benefit-mapping criteria. With additional criteria, you can differentiate benefits by account territory, product category, ship-from location, and more.

REQUIRED EDITIONS
Available in: Enterprise, Unlimited, and Developer Editions that have Rebate Management enabled.
Create Benefits for a Rebate Type
Add benefits to a rebate type to define qualifying ranges and benefit values for each range. View and edit benefits from the Benefits tab on a Rebate Type record.
Add Mappings to Vary Benefits by Criteria
Create qualifying criteria for your benefits to differentiate them by product category, region, and other business-specific dimensions. To introduce the criteria into the benefit structure, map similar fields in the Program Rebate Type Benefit and the Rebate Member Product Aggregate objects.
